parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter condition for the query. If not provided, all topics under the instance will be queried.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: Specifies which instance's topic list to retrieve.

parameters.name: messageTypes
parameters.description: The message type of the topic.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, indicating which page of results to return.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size, the maximum number of results to display per page.
